hero.subtitle: Passionate web developer, looking for new challenges.

project.description: Here are some projects I’ve built as a web developer.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern responsive portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS.

taskManager.title: Task Manager App
taskManager.description: Full-stack task manager with user authentication and CRUD operations.

dashboard.title: E-commerce Dashboard
dashboard.description: Admin dashboard to manage products, orders, and analytics.

blog.title: Blog Platform
blog.description: A full-featured blog platform with comments and likes.

weather.title: Weather App
weather.description: Displays current weather and forecast for any city using API.

chat.title: Chat Application
chat.description: Real-time chat app with multiple rooms and emoji support.

elearning.title: E-learning Platform
elearning.description: Platform to create and follow online courses with quizzes.

about.subtitle: My mission is to empower individuals through technology and education, helping them unlock their full potential.
about.description: With a background in software development and a passion for teaching, I strive to create innovative solutions that make a positive impact on people's lives. Whether it's through mentoring aspiring developers or building accessible educational tools, I am committed to fostering a love for learning and helping others succeed in their journeys.
about.ready: Ready to bring your ideas to life?

contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how we can bring your ideas to life.
contact.workText: I'm currently available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities.
contact.callText: Sometimes a conversation is worth a thousand messages. Feel free to schedule a call to discuss your project.
contact.messageText: Thank you for reaching out! I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
